item.title: hugo + github pages
item.description: hugo使用theme,并push到github pages上 在linux mint上安装hugo. sudo apt-get install hugo 创建站点. hugo new site blog 使用主题. cd blog git init git submodule add https://github.com/RainerChiang/simpleness.git themes/simpleness cp themes/simpleness/exampleSite/config.toml ./ cp -r themes/simpleness/exampleSite/content ./ 启动hugo server,看看效果 hugo server -D 构建静态网页 hugo -D 克隆username.github.io到本地 git clone https://github.com/yourusername/yourusername.github.io 把前面构建的静态网页copy到刚才克隆的库中 cd yourusername.github.io cp ~/blog/public/* ./ -rf 提交 git add --all git commit -m "hugo hosts on github pages" git push -u origin main 浏览器中输入https://yourusername.
